column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Had this place at 4 starts for the deep-dish because I really enjoyed it.  It was some of the best deep dish I've had here in Chicago.  Went back to try the thin crust and that's where the 3 stars comes in.  The thin crust was disappointing
column2: the crust tasted like it was just heated up frozen pizza and the pizza itself feel apart.  Overall
column3: get the deep dish and avoid the thin crust
